name: Tetris&Chill
description:
A relaxing tetris experience.
Take a seat and enjoy the ancient pleasure of colorful pieces stacking.
Tetris N' Chill was developed as a submission for a proposed challenge, and was developed along five nights.

How to Play:

Move piece: Left/Right Arrows
Rotate piece: Up Arrow
Accelerate piece falling: Down Arrow
Skip piece falling: Spacebar
Hold piece: C / LShift

Credits:

Soundtrack:

Time Alone, by David Renda, available at https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/download/time-alone/1434
